data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Bani Suwayf, Egypt into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Bani Suwayf, Egypt
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Bani Suwayf, Egypt.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.section_summary: On average, 8 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Bani Suwayf, Egypt.
data.prayer: Spirit, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Bani Suwayf, Egypt.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, help the 123,259 believers in Bani Suwayf to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Arab, Yemeni people.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Bani Suwayf to agree with you and with one another.
Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the state of Bani Suwayf, Egypt.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken the sleepers and call them to repent and be baptized in the state of Bani Suwayf. Set an urgency in their hearts.
data.verse: And now why do you wait? Rise and be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on his name.’
